title: Alegria by PG Lite womens Smart Shoe
features: Syncs with the TRAQ by Alegria smartphone phone app for accurate step count
Dream Fit knit upper with adjustable hook-and-loop strap.
Ribbed collar, inside padded heel counter and removable footbed.
Dual-density polyurethane, slip-resistant and non-marking outsole
description: TRAQ by Alegria is the first comfort walking shoe with Q-Chip️ Technology — an integrated pedometer embedded in the shoe that instantly syncs with your smart phone for an accurate step count. The Qutie is, in fact, a cutie! It's the perfect blend of a classic Mary Jane silhouette morphed into a sneaker. Its lightweight Dream Fit️ knit upper will keep your feet breathing and comfy. TRAQ’s dual-density polyurethane Q-Sport Rocker Outsole offers increased support, balanced weight distribution, enhanced shocked absorption, and better rebound and bounce when in motion.
details: {"Item model number": "QUT-5019", "Department": "Womens", "Date First Available": "April 3, 2022", "Manufacturer": "Pepper Gate Footwear Inc."}
